JavaCool303

Class Cool303Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaCool303.Cool303Component
      • JavaCool303.Cool303Container
        • JavaCool303.Cool303Box

  • public class Cool303Box
extends Cool303Container
    A Cool303Box is a visible container, which, by being a subclass of Cool303Container, can contain Cool303Components and Cool303Containers. It is a wrapper class around JPanel.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class JavaCool303.Cool303Container

        guiContainer

      • Fields inherited from class JavaCool303.Cool303Component

        theme

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cool303Box(Cool303Theme theme, int rows, int cols)
      Constructs a new Cool303Box with its layout based upon Swing's Grid Layout

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyTheme()
      With its given theme, the 'applyTheme' method will stylize the box's background color and its border.
      java.awt.Dimension getBoxSize()
      The 'getBoxSize' method returns the size of the JPanel that is Cool303Box is wrapped around
      protected java.awt.Component getSwingComponent()
      This method returns the underlying JPanel, which is intended either for nesting the JPanels or for retrieving the JPanel to be displayed in a Cool303Frame (a wrapper for JFrame).
      void setBoxSize(int height, int width)
      Given a specified height and width, the 'setBoxSize' method attempts to resize under those given size constraints.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cool303Box

        public Cool303Box(Cool303Theme theme,
                  int rows,
                  int cols)
        Constructs a new Cool303Box with its layout based upon Swing's Grid Layout
        Parameters:
        theme - The Cool303Theme that all components within this container shall follow
        rows - Number of rows in the container's layout
        cols - Number of columns in the container's layout

    • Method Detail

      • setBoxSize

        public void setBoxSize(int height,
                       int width)
        Given a specified height and width, the 'setBoxSize' method attempts to resize under those given size constraints. If the given constraints are too small (i.e., prevent part of window to be seen), then constraints are ignored and the window unaffected.
        Parameters:
        height - The new height of the window
        width - The new width of the window

      • getBoxSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getBoxSize()
        The 'getBoxSize' method returns the size of the JPanel that is Cool303Box is wrapped around
        Returns:
        Height and width of the enclosed JPanel

      • applyTheme

        public void applyTheme()
        With its given theme, the 'applyTheme' method will stylize the box's background color and its border. If the theme's box color and/or box border is not specified, then the box will revert to the default color and/or border as specified by the Swing Look-and-Feel.
        Overrides:
        applyTheme in class Cool303Container

      • getSwingComponent

        protected java.awt.Component getSwingComponent()
        This method returns the underlying JPanel, which is intended either for nesting the JPanels or for retrieving the JPanel to be displayed in a Cool303Frame (a wrapper for JFrame).
        Overrides:
        getSwingComponent in class Cool303Container
        Returns:
